nodes.text: The Mirgoshir campaign was a campaign that occurred during the early months of the Clone Wars. Focusing on the planet Agamar in the Mirgoshir system, the battle saw Count Dooku test the Force Harvester superweapon early in the fighting. Republic forces fought to retake the star system, and fighting was still occurring four months later, when Separatist forces at Agamar were unable to reinforce those on Brentaal IV.
